thread.title: Alabama beat reporters: Predictions for the Alabama vs. Arkansas game
thread.title_full: Alabama beat reporters: Predictions for the Alabama vs. Arkansas game

author: Vasha Hunt | vhunt@al.com
title: Alabama beat reporters: Predictions for the Alabama vs. Arkansas game
text:
Comments 
Alabama beat reporters John Talty and Michael Casagrande give their predictions for the Alabama vs Arkansas game in Friday's beat reporter show. 
Watch the video above to see what Talty and Casagrande are predicting, and enjoy one more look at last week's game gallery below to see exactly what Alabama can do to run-first teams like Georgia and Arkansas. 
To catch the other Alabama beat reporter shows this week, here are links to Monday , Tuesday , Wednesday and Thursday's shows. 
Alabama hosts Arkansas at 6 p.m. Saturday - the game is being broadcast on ESPN.
